### **40139100, Standing Offer for Sterile Cellulose Sponge-Sticks**

**Reference Number:** WS3984518968-Doc4162495786

**Amendment Number:** 3

**Notice Type:** Request for Standing Offer ( Demande d’offre à commandes )


#### Summary of the Solicitation

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites interested suppliers to participate in the Standing Offer for Sterile Cellulose Sponge-Sticks ( Pinces Porte-Éponge Stériles En Cellulose).

**Background**

The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) seeks to establish a Standing Offer for the supply of  Sterile Cellulose Listeria Sponge-sticks.

#### Specific Requirements

- **Deadline for Submission of Bids:** The deadline for submission of bids has been updated to **October 6, 2023 at 14:00 (EDT).**

- **Eligibility and Requirements:**

  * The offeror must meet the mandatory requirements detailed in Annex A - Requirement of the Request for Standing Offer.
  * The supply must meet specific specifications and quality standards.
  * Offers must be submitted in either of the official languages of Canada (English or French).

#### Evaluation Criteria

This Standing Offer is being evaluated on the basis of lowest cost-per-point.

#### Standing Offer Authority

Enquiries regarding this Standing Offer and any request for debriefing shall be addressed to:

  **Mr. Cristian Ardila (SPAC/PSPC)**  
  cristian.ardila@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca  
 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau QC K1A 0S5 Canada

#### Documents

All documents related to this Standing Offer are available on Ariba Discovery:

*https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17259944?extsite=MTcyNTk5NDRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==*
